content: In the Lean 4 manual, interpolated strings such as s!"foo {bar}" are explained. But I have also seen things like m!"{term}" in HitchHiker Guide to Logical Verification and f!"{declName"} in Metaprogramming in Lean 4. Is there documentation that lists all such string literal prefixes and explains their meanings? Pointers greatly appreciated.

These notations are respectively

#check termS!_
#check Lean.termM!_
#check Std.termF!_

but unfortunately none of them have docstrings! If they did, then you would see that docstring when you hovered over them.
Well, anyone can define a new one, but in practice those are the main ones you need
